description:
Found the algorithm here, and adapted it slightly because multiple return statements are not yet supported by the converter.

Results in Python and in Free42 are the same: 10 XEQ "fib" gives 55. 40 XEQ "fib" gives 102,334,155.
source:
def fib(n):
  a = 0
  b = 1
  for i in range(0, n):
    old_b = b
    b = a + b
    a = old_b
  return a
title: Fibonacci
